creator: rxh@gers.com
text:
Whenever I run antstructure, the DTD that is generated adds description, id and 
taskname to just about every element.  Is this behavior documented anywhere?  
Are any of the attributes documented anywhere?

I was under the impression that description is an attribute only on certain 
elements.
they are common to all tasks - added it to the documentation in nightly 2001-06-14
creator: bodewig@apache.org
